name: recording
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C ] speech, music, or moving pictures that have been recorded to be listened to or watched later: I bought a recording of Maria Callas singing Verdi.
B2 [ U ] the process or business of storing sounds or moving pictures using electronic equipment so that they can be heard or seen later: a recording studio
More examplesFewer examplesa digital recordinga live recordingMost of the bands that appear on the show just mime to a recording of their songs.The recording has been reissued to celebrate the conductor's 80th birthday.All the subtleties of the music are conveyed in this new recording.
